metadata.description: Advanced Claude Code plugins for the agent-skills library. Provides mechanical enforcement of skill rules via hooks, custom agents for pipeline roles, and session state management.

plugins.name: tdd-enforcement
plugins.description: Mechanical enforcement of TDD phase boundaries via hooks. Blocks file edits outside the current phase, verifies test output after edits, and enforces domain review gates.

plugins.name: pipeline-agents
plugins.description: Custom agents for factory pipeline roles with tool restrictions. Pipeline controller cannot edit files; TDD phase agents are restricted to their phase's file types.

plugins.name: ensemble-coordinator
plugins.description: Ensemble team coordinator agent with retrospective enforcement hooks. Coordinator is restricted to coordination-only tools.

plugins.name: session-tools
plugins.description: Session state management hooks for crash recovery. Auto-saves WORKING_STATE.md before compaction, restores context on session start, and runs session reflection on stop.
